title: "MLOps: The Machine Learning Assembly Line"
excerpt: "There’s another practice that’s following a similar trajectory in data science today: MLOps. A portmanteau of two abbreviations (‘ML’ for ‘machine learning’ and ‘Ops’ for ‘operations’), the concept is akin to DevOps, i.e., a pipeline from developer to product. As with assembly lines, the goal of MLOps isn’t making ..."
